item.title: About
item.description: About me Link to heading I am a software engineer based in Nieuwegein, the Netherlands. Things that I like about software engineering are: never stop learning collaborating presenting ideas and techniques Most of my experience is with the Azure cloud. I love cloud development because of the ability to script everything. Recently my experience has been mostly Azure Kubernetes Service and everything that comes with that. Although at home I have been dabbling in on premises development with my home server, which also lead me to make this page.
